INVALID_VPC_NAME: vpcName must be a non-empty string.
INVALID_REGION: Region '{region}' is not valid. Allowed regions are: {allowed_regions}.
INVALID_CIDR: cidr '{cidr}' is not a valid CIDR block.
EMPTY_SUBNETS: subnets must be a non-empty list.
INVALID_SUBNET_NAME: subnetName in subnet #{index} must be a non-empty string.
INVALID_SUBNET_CIDR: cidr '{cidr}' in subnet #{index} is not a valid CIDR block.
SUBNET_NOT_IN_VPC: Subnet cidr '{subnet_cidr}' in subnet #{index} is not within VPC cidr '{vpc_cidr}'.
INVALID_AVAILABILITY_ZONE: availabilityZone '{az}' in subnet #{index} does not belong to region '{region}'.
VPC_EXISTED: VPC found with the name {vpc_name}. So, please give different vpcName
